fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are hanged on Day 2, you immediately win. Otherwise, reroll to a random non-Power Town role at the beginning of Night 2, or immediately if you become this role past Day 2.
- If some role has time travel abilities and it becomes Day 2 again, you revert to Agrou Angel (4430). If you fail to be hanged again, revert back to whatever role you were before. Retain this attribute on role change.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get yourself hanged on Day 2, OR hang every criminal and evildoer, if that somehow happens before Night 2 begins.
